properties.Subject: Message from NiFi - Spark Jobs Exceeds Runtime

properties.Script Body:
import time
from org.apache.nifi.processor.io import StreamCallback
from java.nio.charset import StandardCharsets

time.sleep(120)  # wait 2 minutes

exec_id = flowFile.getAttribute("exec.id")

# Check DistributedMapCache for completion flag
cache = context.getProperty("Map Cache").asControllerService(org.apache.nifi.distributed.cache.client.DistributedMapCacheClient)
completed = cache.get(exec_id.encode("utf-8"))

if completed is None:
    # Still running — route to PutEmail
    flowFile = session.putAttribute(flowFile, "alert", "ExecuteStreamCommand still running after 2 minutes")
    session.transfer(flowFile, REL_SUCCESS)
else:
    # Already completed — drop or route to success
    session.remove(flowFile)
